headline: What Boeing (BA)'s New EVA 787-9 Sale and US$2.7 Billion Apache Deal Mean For Shareholders
summary: In December 2025, EVA Airways Corporation announced it would purchase four Boeing 787-9 aircraft for up to US$485 million each, with a total transaction value capped at US$1.94 billion to support its operating needs. This widebody order underscores continuing airline appetite for long-haul, fuel-efficient jets, reinforcing Boeing’s role as a key supplier in international fleet renewal. We’ll now examine how the new US$2.7 billion Apache support contract shapes Boeing’s existing investment...
